answers.answer: I believe babies born prematurely have to stay in the nicu til they're at least 5 pounds an all there organs are functioning perfectly.
Just wanted to know did u go into labour natural. I have been told i have preeclamsia and diabetes now so am getting nervous as i am 35 weeks on Wednesday.

question: Hi everyone, due to preeclampsia I had my baby girl early. She's beautiful breathing wonderful. But she will be in nicu for alil while. They won't tell me how long tho smh. She is 3 pounds 12 oz. I'm pumping so hopefully changes quick. She came out screaming lol baby girl wasn't haven't it :) lungs are amazing thank god. But yea just giving an update. And how long did your baby's stay in nicu??
title: How long did your baby stay in nicu.update!! Had my baby girl at 32 weeks 3 days!!
